title_sort: susan stafford to walt whitman, 23 december 1877
title: Susan Stafford to Walt Whitman, 23 December 1877
text: HomeSunday evening Dec 23rdDear friend we have looked for you down with us so long & you have not come that we have given up all hope of ever seeing you again with us so the kit of fish that you have come safe more than words can tell would have written for you last week to spend Christmas with us but I had a very severe attactattack of the heart & was not able to do so I am better now will you please come this week we shall look for you do not disappoint us we have waited so longplease write what day you will come & we will meet you at the stationever your friendS. M. Staffordfrom Mrs Stafford Dec 23 '77â€”bro't up by Herbert ans'd next day Susan Stafford to Walt Whitman, 23 December 1877
